long_description: The Smith Transport snow helmet serves up advanced technology to the powder-hungry masses, offering minimum bulkiness and maximum ventilation without sacrificing protection, comfort or style. Hybrid in-mold shell construction creates a low-profile helmet with reduced volume and light weight. Micro-adjustable x Boa(R) fit system sports an intuitive dial system for on-the-fly, single-handed control; 3/4 halo design offers self-centering and vertical adjustability. AirEvac 2 ventilation drives warm air away from your goggles and out of the helmet through internal channels and 16 vents. Low-profile Regulator climate control system allows you to easily modify the amount of airflow and heat exhaust, even while wearing gloves. Removable and machine-washable Nanosilver performance lining incorporates silver-based antimicrobial material and soft cushioning to keep your helmet clean and comfortable. Removable, machine-washable ear pads provide a comfortable seal from the weather on stormy days; for a warm spring day, remove the earpads to reduce weight and enhance cooling. Removable goggles lock helps ensure your goggles stay with you after that head-over-heels wipeout through blower powder. The Smith Transport snow helmet is compatible with Skullcandy audio systems (not included). This snow helmet complies with ASTM F 2040 and/or CE EN 1077 alpine ski and snowboard helmet safety standards.
